org.apache.poi.hslf.record

Class HeadersFootersAtom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.hslf.record.Record
      • org.apache.poi.hslf.record.RecordAtom
        • org.apache.poi.hslf.record.HeadersFootersAtom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericRecord 

    public final class HeadersFootersAtom
extends RecordAtom
    An atom record that specifies options for displaying headers and footers on a presentation slide or notes slide.(一种原子记录，指定在演示幻灯片或注释幻灯片上显示标题和页脚的选项。)
    Author:
    Yegor Kozlov

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HeadersFootersAtom.FormatIndex
      FormatIndex enum without LCID mapping(不带LCID映射的收件箱索引枚举)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int fHasDate
      A bit that specifies whether the date is displayed in the footer.(指定日期是否显示在页脚中的位。)
      static int fHasFooter
      bit that specifies whether the footer text is displayed.(指定是否显示页脚文本的位。)
      static int fHasHeader
      bit that specifies whether the header text is displayed.(指定是否显示标题文本的位。)
      static int fHasSlideNumber
      A bit that specifies whether the slide number is displayed in the footer.(一个位，指定幻灯片编号是否显示在页脚中。)
      static int fHasTodayDate
      A bit that specifies whether the current datetime is used for displaying the datetime.(指定当前日期时间是否用于显示日期时间的位。)
      static int fHasUserDate
      A bit that specifies whether the date specified in UserDateAtom record is used for displaying the datetime.(一个位，指定是否使用在userDateAtom记录中指定的日期来显示日期时间。)

      • getFormatId

        public int getFormatId()
        A signed integer that specifies the format ID to be used to style the datetime.

        It MUST be in the range [0, 12].
        This value is converted into a string as specified by the index field of the DateTimeMCAtom record. It MUST be ignored unless fHasTodayDate is TRUE.

        (一个有符号的整数，指定用于设置日期时间样式的格式ID。它必须在[0，12]范围内。此值将转换为由DateTimeMCAtom记录的索引字段指定的字符串。除非fHasTodayDate为真，否则必须忽略它。)
        Returns:
        A signed integer that specifies the format ID to be used to style the datetime.(一个有符号的整数，指定用于设置日期时间样式的格式ID。)

      • setFormatId

        public void setFormatId(int formatId)
        A signed integer that specifies the format ID to be used to style the datetime.(一个有符号的整数，指定用于设置日期时间样式的格式ID。)
        Parameters:
        formatId - A signed integer that specifies the format ID to be used to style the datetime.(formatId -一个有符号的整数，指定用于设置日期时间样式的格式ID。)

      • getMask

        public int getMask()
        A bit mask specifying options for displaying headers and footers(指定显示标题和页脚的选项的位屏蔽)
      • A - fHasDate (1 bit): A bit that specifies whether the date is displayed in the footer.
      • B - fHasTodayDate (1 bit): A bit that specifies whether the current datetime is used for displaying the datetime.
      • C - fHasUserDate (1 bit): A bit that specifies whether the date specified in UserDateAtom record is used for displaying the datetime.
      • D - fHasSlideNumber (1 bit): A bit that specifies whether the slide number is displayed in the footer.
      • E - fHasHeader (1 bit): A bit that specifies whether the header text specified by HeaderAtom record is displayed.
      • F - fHasFooter (1 bit): A bit that specifies whether the footer text specified by FooterAtom record is displayed.
      • reserved (10 bits): MUST be zero and MUST be ignored.
Returns:
A bit mask specifying options for displaying headers and footers
